title: Merge guided escalation implementation to QA branch
description:
CRITICAL: The guided escalation feature (commit 3da36dc) has been successfully implemented and tested on branch agent/engineer/task-chain-pl, but has NOT been merged to the QA test branch (agent/qa/task-chain-ch).

## Required Actions:
1. Cherry-pick or merge commit 3da36dc to the QA test branch
2. Resolve any merge conflicts if they occur
3. Verify all tests still pass after merge
4. Address style issues (optional but recommended):
   - Refactor 11 lines exceeding 100 chars in escalation.py
   - Remove 3 unnecessary f-strings in escalation.py
   - Update deprecated datetime.utcnow() calls to datetime.now(datetime.UTC)

## Implementation Details:
Commit: 3da36dc
Branch: agent/engineer/task-chain-pl
Files changed: 6 files (+878, -14 lines)
Test coverage: 15/15 tests passing (100%)
Security: 0 vulnerabilities
Code quality: 8.73/10

See QA_REVIEW_GUIDED_ESCALATION.md for full review details.
acceptance_criteria: Commit 3da36dc is merged/cherry-picked to QA test branch
Full test suite passes (no new failures introduced)
deliverables: Merged branch with guided escalation feature
notes: Feature is already implemented and tested - just needs merge
